text: Clifton Alexander "Alex" Hawkins (July 2, 1937 - September 12, 2017) was a retired American football player. He played professionally as a running back in the National Football League (NFL) for the Baltimore Colts and Atlanta Falcons. He was known as a special teams player. He was a co-captain with the Colts. He was born in Welch, West Virginia. Hawkins died of complications from Alzheimer's disease on September 12, 2017 in Columbia, South Carolina at the age of 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * Football stats at Pro-football reference.com Category:1937 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from Alzheimer's disease Category:Disease-related deaths in South Carolina Category:Indianapolis Colts players Category:Atlanta Falcons players Category:Sportspeople from West Virginia Category:Sportspeople from South Carolina
